languages.text: "Когда я был юн, помню, как в бою один колдун наслал на меня морок. Братья мои мне казались исчадьями варпа, и я на них бросился. К счастью, с колдуном быстро расправился наш вожак, и я не успел никого ранить. Ужас меня обуял, когда я понял, что я чуть не сотворил".

"Once, when I was young, a foul sorcerer bewitched me in battle. It made me see my own brothers as warp spawn, and I attacked them. Good was my fortune that our leader made short work of the scum before I could harm any of my brothers. And great was my horror when I realised what I had nearly done."
languages.original_text: "Когда я был юн, помню, как в бою один колдун наслал на меня морок. Братья мои мне казались исчадьями варпа, и я на них бросился. К счастью, с колдуном быстро расправился наш вожак, и я не успел никого ранить. Ужас меня обуял, когда я понял, что я чуть не сотворил".

traits.locale_text: "When I was young, a foul sorcerer bewitched me in battle once. It made me see my own brothers as warp spawn, and I attacked them. Good was my fortune that our leader made short work of the scum before I could harm any of them. And chilling was my horror when I realised what I had nearly done."

"When I was young, a foul sorcerer bewitched me in battle once. It made me see my own brothers as warp spawn, and I attacked them. Good was my fortune that our leader made short work of the scum before I could harm any of them. And chilling was my horror when I realised what I had nearly done."

"Once, when I was young, a foul sorcerer bewitched me in battle. It made me see my own brothers as warp spawn, and I attacked them. Good was my fortune that our leader made short work of the scum before I could harm any of my brothers. And great was my horror when I realised what I had nearly done."

"Once, when I was young, a foul sorcerer bewitched me in battle. It made me see my own brothers as warp spawn, and I attacked them. Good was my fortune that our leader made short work of the scum before I could harm any of my brothers. And great was my horror when I realised what I had nearly done."

"Once, when I was young, a foul sorcerer bewitched me in battle. It made me see my own brothers as warp spawn, and I attacked them. Good was my fortune that our leader made short work of the scum before I could harm any of my brothers. And great was my horror when I realised what I had nearly done."

languages.text: « Un jour, quand j'étais jeune, un infâme sorcier m'a jeté un sort en plein combat. Je me suis mis à attaquer mes propres frères, car ils m'apparaissaient sous la forme d'engeances du Warp. Par chance, notre chef a rapidement tué ce scélérat avant que je puisse faire du mal à ma meute, mais un sentiment d'horreur s'est emparé de moi lorsque je me suis rendu compte de ce que j'avais bien failli faire. »
languages.original_text: "Once, when I was young, a foul sorcerer bewitched me in battle. It made me see my own brothers as warp spawn, and I attacked them. Good was my fortune that our leader made short work of the scum before I could harm any of my brothers. And great was my horror when I realised what I had nearly done."

traits.locale_text: « Un jour, quand j'étais jeune, un infâme sorcier m'a jeté un sort en plein combat. Je me suis mis à attaquer mes propres frères, car ils m'apparaissaient sous la forme d'engeances du Warp. Par chance, notre chef a rapidement tué ce scélérat avant que je puisse faire du mal à ma meute, mais un sentiment d'horreur s'est emparé de moi lorsque je me suis rendu compte de ce que j'avais bien failli faire. »

languages.text: «En una ocasión, de joven, un pérfido hechicero me embrujó en combate. Me hizo ver a mis propios hermanos como abominaciones de la disformidad, y les ataqué. Grande fue mi suerte cuando nuestro líder acabó con esa escoria antes de que pudiera herir a alguno de mis hermanos. Cuando comprendí lo que había intentado hacer, terrible fue mi espanto».
languages.original_text: "Once, when I was young, a foul sorcerer bewitched me in battle. It made me see my own brothers as warp spawn, and I attacked them. Good was my fortune that our leader made short work of the scum before I could harm any of my brothers. And great was my horror when I realised what I had nearly done."

traits.locale_text: «En una ocasión, de joven, un pérfido hechicero me embrujó en combate. Me hizo ver a mis propios hermanos como abominaciones de la disformidad, y les ataqué. Grande fue mi suerte cuando nuestro líder acabó con esa escoria antes de que pudiera herir a alguno de mis hermanos. Cuando comprendí lo que había intentado hacer, terrible fue mi espanto».

languages.text: “那还是我年轻的时候。有一次，有个邪恶的巫师在战斗中对我施了恶咒，结果，我把我的兄弟们当成了亚空间的孽物，还攻击了他们。我很幸运，我还没来得及伤到我的兄弟们，我们的头狼就干掉了那个人渣。当我意识到我差点就袭击了自己的兄弟时，我真的被吓坏了。”
languages.original_text: "Once, when I was young, a foul sorcerer bewitched me in battle. It made me see my own brothers as warp spawn, and I attacked them. Good was my fortune that our leader made short work of the scum before I could harm any of my brothers. And great was my horror when I realised what I had nearly done."

traits.locale_text: “那还是我年轻的时候。有一次，有个邪恶的巫师在战斗中对我施了恶咒，结果，我把我的兄弟们当成了亚空间的孽物，还攻击了他们。我很幸运，我还没来得及伤到我的兄弟们，我们的头狼就干掉了那个人渣。当我意识到我差点就袭击了自己的兄弟时，我真的被吓坏了。”

languages.text: 「かつて私が若かった頃、戦いの中で邪悪な魔術師に魅入られた。私は自分の兄弟を<歪み>の産物に見立てて攻撃した。幸運だったのは、私が兄弟に危害を加える前に、我々のリーダーがそのクズどもを手早く始末してくれたことだ。そして、危うく自分がやりかけたことを悟ったときの恐怖は大きかった」
languages.original_text: "Once, when I was young, a foul sorcerer bewitched me in battle. It made me see my own brothers as warp spawn, and I attacked them. Good was my fortune that our leader made short work of the scum before I could harm any of my brothers. And great was my horror when I realised what I had nearly done."

traits.locale_text: 「かつて私が若かった頃、戦いの中で邪悪な魔術師に魅入られた。私は自分の兄弟を<歪み>の産物に見立てて攻撃した。幸運だったのは、私が兄弟に危害を加える前に、我々のリーダーがそのクズどもを手早く始末してくれたことだ。そして、危うく自分がやりかけたことを悟ったときの恐怖は大きかった」

languages.text: "Einst, als ich jung war, verzauberte mich ein böser Hexer im Kampf. Er ließ mich meine eigenen Brüder als Warp-Brut sehen, und ich griff sie an. Glück hatte ich, dass unserer Anführer kurzen Prozess mit dem Abschaum machte, bevor ich meinen Brüdern schaden konnte. Und entsetzt war ich, als ich erkannte, was ich beinahe getan hätte."
languages.original_text: "Once, when I was young, a foul sorcerer bewitched me in battle. It made me see my own brothers as warp spawn, and I attacked them. Good was my fortune that our leader made short work of the scum before I could harm any of my brothers. And great was my horror when I realised what I had nearly done."

traits.locale_text: "Einst, als ich jung war, verzauberte mich ein böser Hexer im Kampf. Er ließ mich meine eigenen Brüder als Warp-Brut sehen, und ich griff sie an. Glück hatte ich, dass unserer Anführer kurzen Prozess mit dem Abschaum machte, bevor ich meinen Brüdern schaden konnte. Und entsetzt war ich, als ich erkannte, was ich beinahe getan hätte."
